sentences.sContent: Your résumé should highlight your skills and achievements.
sentences.sCn: 你的简历应该突出自己的技能和成绩。

sentences.sContent: ...write in the margins and highlight passages...
...Others highlight the strain that undocumented immigrants place on public services...

synos.tran: 最精彩的部分；最重要的事情；[电子]加亮区

remMethod.val: high(高的) ＋ light(发光) → 高处的亮光 → 突出

words.tran: 增强亮度；突出性，醒目性
使…显著；以强光照射（highlight的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: to make a problem or subject easy to notice so that people pay attention to it

trans.tranCn: 最精彩的部分， 最重要的事件
trans.tranOther: the most important, interesting, or enjoyable part of something such as a holiday, performance, or sports competition
